DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test how vinflunine interacts with rifampin in the human body
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Interaction of Rifampin and Vinflunine in Subjects With Advanced Cancer
DOC.criteria: Cancer unresponsive to previous treatment Consent for genetic samples Cancer of the blood Spread of cancer to the brain Moderate or severe nerve damage Low white blood cell counts and platelet counts Inadequate liver or kidney function Prior treatment with vinflunine Use of certain medications that might interfere with the metabolism of vinflunine
